### Bio
[Interdisciplinary scholar](bookshelf.html) studying the science of intelligence.

### Currently
Founding scientist at [Prior Computers](https://www.priorcomputers.ai), the machine psychology company.

### Previously
Researcher at the [Simons Institute for the Theory of Computing, Berkeley](https://simons.berkeley.edu/homepage). 

Undergrad in CS at [University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign](https://siebelschool.illinois.edu/)

### Select Publications
- **S. Schapiro**, S. Shashidhar, A. Gladstone, J. Black, R. Moon, D. Hakkani-Tur, L. R. Varshney, [Combinatorial Creativity: A New Frontier in Generalization Abilities](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.21043), Under Review at 16th International Conference on Learning Representations, 2026.
- **S. Schapiro**, J. Black, L. R. Varshney, [Transformational Creativity in Science: A Graphical Theory](https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.18687), in the Proceedings of the 16th International Conference on Computational Creativity, Jun 23-27, Campinas, Brazil. **[Best Short Paper Award]**
- A. Sanyal, **S. Schapiro**, S. Shashidhar, R. Moon, L. R. Varshney, D. Hakkani-Tur, [Spark: A System for Scientifically Creative Idea Generation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20090), in the Proceedings of the 16th International Conference on Computational Creativity, Jun 23-27, Campinas, Brazil.
